                           Release Notes

Comments :
After defeating France and imprisoning Napoleon on Elba, ending two decades 
of war, Europe is shocked to find Napoleon has escaped and has caused the 
French Army to defect from the King back to him. The best of the British 
generals, the Duke of Wellington, beat Napolean&#039;s best generals in Spain 
and Portugal, but has never faced Napoleon. Wellington stands between Napoleon 
with a makeshift Anglo-Allied army and the Prussians. A Napoleon victory will 
plunge Europe back into a long term war. An allied victory could bring long 
term peace to Europe. The two meet at Waterloo where the fate of Europe will 
be decided.

Director : Sergei Bondarchuk

Writer: H.A.L. Craig (story)
        H.A.L. Craig (screenplay)
